reviews.text: An underrated dental clinic that people miss out. I went here regularly. The staff service is excellent, and the dentist is also very friendly. title: Dr Yie Siew Kee Dental Surgeon
address: 17, Jalan Raja, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: amoy asl
reviews.text: Friendly and Good Advice. Recommend

reviews.name: Gen Liv
reviews.text: Friendly and chatty but … 5 minutes work done for a scaling and cleaning is a scam. Introduced a friend and 3 of us went in for scaling. All done in 15 min. Scolded by friend. Better go Bright Smile or smiley face.

reviews.name: Yeo Karen
reviews.text: I am always phobia going to dentist but now I definitely will find this dentist if I have any tooth problem. Good job from Brunei,Seria

reviews.name: YS
reviews.text: Dr Yie the son is a good and competent dentist. I had problem with a tooth and x-ray showed another tooth underneath the gum and a Penang dentist thought that is the problem which caused the pain. He told me to have a minor tooth surgery to take out the tooth underneath gum so that it does not affect the top tooth. As I happened to be going home to Miri so i didn't do the minor surgery but went to check it up with Dr Yie instead. He told me the underneath tooth is a good tooth. There is no reason to extract it. He also went through the risk associated with such extraction with me which the Penang one omitted. In his view, it was the tooth on top that was in decay and need extraction. He also said once the top one is extracted out, there is chance that the bottom one could come up. I took his advice and did a normal extraction on the top decaying tooth. Few weeks later the good tooth at the bottom came out indeed. Thankfully i wen to see him. Or i would have lost 2 teeth - one at the top as it is decayed, and one the underneath one which is  perfectly good.

reviews.name: Mohd Dzul Azri Malik
reviews.text: Nice Place to go when emegency pain..

title: Bright Smile Dental Clinic
address: Lots 2114 & 2115, 1st Floor, Yakin Commercial Centre, Jalan Yakin,, Off Jalan Bulan Sabit, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Yizreel Yat
reviews.text: I used to feel insecure about smiling because I was shy about the color of my teeth. But after consulting with Dr. Larry, I decided to go ahead with the crown procedure and I’m so glad I did. Now I’ve regained my confidence to smile again. Thank you, Dr. Larry, for making my smile brighter. God bless you🙏🏻

reviews.name: Lihyang Wong
reviews.text: Thank you so much to Dr. Larry and his team for their amazing work during my wisdom tooth extraction today. Dr. Larry provided a detailed explanation of the procedure beforehand. During the extraction, he kept me informed about each step and checked in to make sure I was alright. The entire process was smooth and surprisingly painless!

reviews.name: Zhi Ming Ting
reviews.text: Had an unbearable toothache and was fortunate to be treated by Dr. Larry Yong. He thoroughly explained the underlying cause and clearly walked me through each step of the procedure. With his skill and efficiency, he managed to extract my horizontally impacted wisdom tooth quickly and safely—without causing me any discomfort. I recommend Dr. Larry Yong to anyone seeking exceptional dental care here.

reviews.name: Stephanie Johnnes
reviews.text: Great service! Dr. Esther took care of my teeth cleaning and filling. She was super gentle and made sure to check in with me about any pain. If I did feel uncomfortable, she actually paused and continued really softly, which isn't something I've experienced with other dentists who just keep going even when patients are clearly hurting. Plus, she explained everything really well.

reviews.name: Susan Pang
reviews.text:
APPRECIATION IS A WONDERFUL THING.

We’re brought up by beautiful parents who taught us to never ever forget to say “THANK YOU” to even a slightly small simple things people do for us. It’s a matter of appreciation and making that person feeling important. Mama always said “To make a person Happier”. I can’t argued with her about it:)

Dr Larry Yong Bright Smile Dental Clinic Yakin is the person we would like to show how truly grateful we are with his Service. His professionalism not only showed us how talented he is with the skills in dentistry. His personality, love, caring and patience are beyond our expectations.
Growing up I had a baddest experience with our Dentist in Edmonton. Because of him. I’d the worst fear going to any Dentists since then. I will navigate through the whole process of giving excuses not going to visit a Dentist.
Until this trip to Miri with my brother and SIL.
Thanks to our dear cousin June Chin  to made all these arrangements for us to meet Dr Larry Yong. He’s actually related to us (in some ways)
Larry made sure his Dentophobia Susan Gugu is well taking care of by explaining to me what to expect and making sure nothing can be more scare than death 😂 😝
I truly appreciate his love, caring and all the work he did for me. My teeth looks so beautiful now 😁😆😂

Not forgetting to mentioned his beautiful assistants. They’re the beautiful souls as well.
We also would like to take this opportunity to show our appreciation To the front desk staffs, Dr Ain and her staffs.
THANK YOU ALL FOR MAKING OUR EXPERIENCES SO HAPPY AND POSITIVE.

We also would like to apologized for messing up your schedules. Being late
Making you guys to stayed late for us.

We Truly Appreciate each one of you 🙏🏻🥰😘😍
Until Then. Take great care of yourself
Continue to be your best 😍

BTW: MY FAMILY AND I HIGHLY RECOMMEND DR LARRY YONG & DR AIN

reviews.name: Veronica Pang
reviews.text:
Went to see Dr Bong for a minor procedure. He was gentle, fast and did a great job to cover the hole on my tooth. He was also aware of my sensitivity and was careful to not push my limits in terms of pain tolerance.
He also explained the procedure and my questions in detail. Would definitely recommend.

Update: Dr Ally is great too! It was a pleasant experience. She is gentle and careful with sensitive areas of the teeth, workmanship is great too! Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Daisy Dee Erong
reviews.text: Had minor oral surgery for wisdom tooth with Dr. Larry. Procedure was painless and pain management during recovery almost nothing. Dr. Larry was very careful and calm during the whole procedure making sure I don't feel the pain. Explanation was done thoroughly pre procedure what to expect during and recovery. Highly recommend Dr. Larry (Bright Smile Yakin) to anyone.

reviews.name: ndfc1507ify
reviews.text: "New" bridge teeth broke on another part of tooth. Left a very sharp piece that cut my finger & tongue. Couldn't eat/talk or move my tongue without pain whole night. As was travelling, had to wait the next day to look for a dental clinic near the hotel to grind the sharp edge & do a temp fill. Y'day the remaining bridge tooth came off.    I have to go back to another clinic to make a new bridge teeth.

tq dr. farhanah!!

reviews.name: A D.
reviews.text: I tried dental spa treatment for the 1st time. Had my dental spa treatment with a cute and friendly Dr Yolander  . The staff were all professional and welcoming. I loved the results, my teeth were much whiter and the treatment very gentle. A beautifully designed clinic as well. Such a good, pleasant experience.

reviews.name: SY
reviews.text: A boutique spa-like dental clinic in the heart of Miri. Went for an impromptu check up and did dental scaling. Was thoroughly impressed with the clinic’s look and ambience. Dr Yolander was attentive and gentle, making sure I was comfortable during treatment.

reviews.name: Suro Hwang
reviews.text: I recently visited Zen Dental and had an excellent experience. The staff were incredibly welcoming and professional from start to finish. The dentist took the time to explain thoroughly, which made me feel very comfortable. The clinic itself was clean, modern, and equipped with the latest technology. I appreciated the gentle and attentive care I received throughout my visit. I highly recommend here to anyone in need of dental services!

reviews.name: Rumaisha Zadie
reviews.text: Really appreciate gentle care from Dr Farhanah and the team <3

reviews.name: Kelsey Kee
reviews.text: I went here for ultra comfort dental spa . Dr Farhanah is friendly , gentle and very professional . I'm terribly afraid of the dentist but Dr Farhanah was very very patient and trying to calm me down 😂 From the moment you walk in and throughout your appointment , you are welcomed with warm and friendly staffs and a lovely clean and modern space . I really love this dental clinic , can't wait for my next visit ! I highly recommend Dr Faranah and her staffs to everyone ❤️

reviews.text: Friendly & courteous dental staff. The lady surgeon is very professional.  I extracted my tooth painlessly. The price is reasonable.  Hope to come back here if I need a dental care.

reviews.name: Muhamad Ajwad Ali
reviews.text: Reasonable price. Now my teeth feel clean already. 😁😁

reviews.name: samuel tan
reviews.text: Visited to do a filling, Dr Hii was very friendly and patient in explaining the procedure. Really like the homely feel of the clinic, overall a great experience. Recommended!

street: Lot 747 1st Floor, Jalan Merpati
description:

reviews.text: The doctor is very nice and patient while explaining the service. He is also very detail oriented. The price is also very reasonable. The nurses is also very kind while answering my questions. Definetly will come back again for his other services.

reviews.text: 1st dtg situ,tempat sgt comfy.. nurse pun layan dgn baik. Dentist very professional menjalankan tgs dia..dia layan patient dengan baik.,saya sangat puas hati dengan servis yang diberikan.

reviews.name: Steph O
reviews.text: I had a fantastic experience at Marina Dental! From the moment we walked in, the staff was friendly and welcoming, making my children feel comfortable and at ease. The dentist was incredibly gentle and explained everything in a way that made it fun and easy for my little ones to understand. The office is bright, clean, and full of kid-friendly touches that kept my children entertained while we waited. Overall, Marina Dental made the dental visit a positive experience, and I’m so grateful for their excellent care. Highly recommend!

reviews.text: Thank you for the good services.. The price is reasonable 👍👍

title: En Dental Clinic 恩牙科诊所
address: Ground Floor, Lot 2918 Block 5, Lor Caltha, Faradale Commercial Centre, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Wendy Pillai
reviews.text:
Had a great experience at En Dental Clinic with Dr. Andrew and Dr. Wong! They were not only professional and thorough but also incredibly kind and patient. I brought my mother along for a visit as well, and they took the time to explain everything clearly, making sure she felt comfortable and reassured throughout the process. It really meant a lot to see how gentle and understanding they were with her.

The clinic itself is clean and welcoming, and the staff are friendly too. Definitely recommend Dr. Andrew, Dr. Wong, and the team if you’re looking for excellent dental care!

reviews.name: Jane Shim Qs
reviews.text: Thank so much for all the staffs with good service and so welcome ppl. Thank you so much to dr andrew for his professionalism in his job to ensure i am comfortable with the treatment. He is patience enuf to understand patient problem and gv the best solution n advice. I like the technology he use to show me my tooth n oral condition give me better understanding before i make decision what i really want. Nice environment clinic, clean and cosy, will appreciate if the music more to relaxing style. Nurses are thoughtful and comfort me when i hv nervous attack. Tq for everything ! Definately recomend tis clinic !! Your next new patient will be my husband 😂

reviews.name: Shahirah Hassan
reviews.text: I love everything. From the dr, receptionist, everyone in that clinic is THE BEST.

reviews.name: Sim Sing Jin
reviews.text:
I used to be quite fearful of visiting the dentist, as I never enjoyed the experience of dental appointments. However, my recent visit to En Dental Clinic completely changed my perception. From the moment I stepped in, I was pleasantly surprised by the clinic’s cozy and minimalist design, which instantly put me at ease. The warm and inviting atmosphere made a significant difference in calming my initial nerves.
The dental assistants were exceptionally gentle and approachable, ensuring that I felt comfortable and well taken care of throughout my visit. Their friendly demeanor created a welcoming environment, making the entire experience much more pleasant. Dr. Andrew, the dentist who attended to me, was not only highly skilled and knowledgeable but also incredibly gentle in his approach. He took the time to explain every step of the treatment, which reassured me and helped me feel more at ease. His expertise and attention to detail truly reflected the clinic’s commitment to top-quality dental care.
Another highlight of my visit was the clinic’s reasonable pricing, which I found to be a great bonus considering the high standard of service provided. Throughout the entire treatment, I was so relaxed that I even dozed off a few times—a testament to how comfortable and painless the experience was.
For anyone looking for professional, high-quality dental care in a soothing and stress-free environment, I highly recommend En Dental Clinic. My experience there was nothing short of exceptional, and it has completely changed the way I feel about dental visits.

reviews.name: PenguinTech
reviews.text: Superb experience. It was my first wisdom tooth extraction and Dr made me feel assured. In fact, I did not feel any pain. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Jayne Lim
reviews.text:
I am extremely satisfied with the service I received at En Dental Clinic! The staff was professional and welcoming, and they made me feel at ease throughout my visit. I also had a whitening treatment, and the results exceeded my expectations. My teeth look brighter and feel healthier! I will definitely be returning for future dental care. Highly recommend!

Special thanks to Dr. Wong and Dr. Andu for taking the extra time to listen to my needs  🥰 Appreciate it 💕✨

reviews.name: Magdeline Nyawai
reviews.text: Doktor yang sangat prihatin dan peramah....service yang sangat bagus.

reviews.name: beranda yii
reviews.text: Dr. Wong is the first dentist I’ve ever met who is so kind, patient, and professional. She explained everything about my teeth in great detail, and I truly appreciated the way she made everything clear to me without rushing or being in a hurry. I also love how she explains step by step what she is doing, making me feel completely at ease throughout the process. She is gentle, cheerful, and very approachable, which made my visit so comfortable. The clinic is equipped with advanced, high-tech technology, including the ability to see our teeth in 3D vision—very impressive! The staff are just as helpful and excellent as the doctor, which made the entire experience even better. Another bonus is the consultation fee: just RM60 for the first visit, and the rest of the visits are free. This is the first time I’ve gained so much knowledge about my dental health. Highly recommended!

title: Createeth Dental Clinic Miri (Bintang Branch)
address: GROUND FLOOR, LOT 788 & 789, Jalan Bintang Jaya 4, Bintang Jaya, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Leeyi
reviews.text: This might be my fave dental clinic so far. Very gentle with the scaling and not as hurt as I’ve experienced before. But, I love the details explanation even more. Probably cause there are still a lot of people scare to meet dentist due to experience and pain they’re feeling; but with that care, gentleness and details explanation. It really helps to put a patient such as myself at ease 💖

reviews.name: Philip Ling
reviews.text:
Outstanding Experience at Createeth Dental Clinic 👍👍

Had the chance to visit Createeth Dental Clinic today for my routine dental check-up, and I was thoroughly impressed. This was at their second branch (they also have another one at Permaisuri).

One thing that stood out is how convenient it is—the clinic is open every day, making it easy to choose a date and time that suits your schedule. The appointment process was straightforward, and I appreciated the reminder message a day before.😊

The clinic itself is modern, clean, and welcoming. The waiting area is tastefully designed and comfortable, and there's even a children’s play area, which makes it very kid-friendly. 🥰

From the moment I walked in, I was greeted warmly and brought directly to the treatment room—no waiting time at all. The clinic is well-organized and hygienic, especially the treatment and compressor rooms, which were spotless and fully equipped.

I’m really glad I met Dr. Louis Siao—he was already prepared and waiting for me. Truly the best dentist I’ve ever met. He spoke gently, explained my dental condition thoroughly, and made me feel completely at ease.

I had scaling and polishing done, which took about an hour. I was initially nervous due to previous bad experiences, but to my surprise, the entire procedure was painless with minimal bleeding—a huge difference from what I’ve experienced before.🥳🥳

After the treatment, Dr. Louis personally cleaned and wiped my mouth gently and gave me useful aftercare advice. His dental assistant was also very kind and attentive.

Price is very reasonable and Payment was quick and smooth—no delays at all.

The service was top-notch. I was so satisfied that I immediately made an appointment for my brother.
I’ll definitely be coming back again!👍👍👍

reviews.name: Mike Malique
reviews.text:
I had my first experience at this cross‑border dental clinic and was genuinely impressed. The moment I arrived, registration was quick and the welcoming atmosphere immediately put me at ease. My dentist and the staff were professional and friendly, taking the time to explain each step and ensure I was comfortable throughout.

What surprised me most was how affordable the premium service felt— equipment, thorough care, and even greetings from other doctors as I passed by, all at a price well below my expectations. Everything were seamless, and I left completely satisfied. I’ll definitely return for my regular checkups and have already recommended this clinic (Bintang & Permaisuri branch) to friends and family.

reviews.name: Anonymous One
reviews.text: Professional, courteous, friendly, and extremely kind staff. They are very easygoing and made the whole treatment much easier.

reviews.name: nur haziqah
reviews.text: Affordable price & very nice doctor 👍🏻

reviews.name: 阿妮
reviews.text: 很不错的体验，价格公道，护士以及牙医都表现出很友好礼貌的态度，很仔细的告诉病者真实的牙齿情况，也会根据病人的经济情况给出很好说建议。 前台服务也很周到

reviews.name: Kelly Lah Ajang
reviews.text: Went for braces consultation today. The nurses, doctor & customer service are very nice and polite. Very recommended

reviews.name: abiegail
reviews.text: I absolutely love this dental clinic! The staff are super friendly and make me feel so comfortable from the moment I walk in. The doctor is so gentle and caring, always making sure I don’t feel any pain during my braces treatment. I was a little nervous at first but they made the whole experience so easy and stress-free 🤩 Plus, the clinic is really pretty and cozy which makes every visit even better. Definitely the best place to go if you want top-notch care with a warm and welcoming atmosphere!

reviews.name: Nicole Shamien Jolly
reviews.text: Clean and safe space. The staff were all friendly and the dental nurses were very assuring. Have been consulting Dr Bong for a few years. He is a gentle and professional dentist.

reviews.name: Natellyna Cheriya
reviews.text: everyone was so kind and friendly, i was comfortable. the doctor explained well and her explanation was easy to understand. i'd love to come back again.

reviews.name: mohd sobri
reviews.text: Omg lurve! I did my crowning here & its fabulous!

reviews.name: Jane Keasberry
reviews.text: Excellent service with Dr Bong who was very patient, informative, caring and detailed attention to my dental works. Puts me at ease when I did the bridge dental work. Thank you to Dr Bong and the caring staff of Bright smile pujut as well with the pleasant lovely waiting ambience. Patient care is top priority and you exceeded all my expectations. Thank you so much. Well done❤️ n keep up the great work ahead even for my next appointment 🙏❤️💕 Jia you!!

reviews.name: Afiqah Azmi
reviews.text:
Appointment were easily made via whatsapp. Upon confirmation of appointment they immediately inform the assigned doctor for you. I like the person who replied to me. Fast, clear and polite.

On the day itself, the staffs at the counter were very nice. I was assigned to Dr Bong. He was very good with the treatments and took the time to explain everything about what had happened to my teeth, the procedures and treatments. Kudos Dr Bong. 👍

Price was quite affordable considering the difficulty of my treatments. Will definitely come back again.

title: MySmile Dental Marina Miri
address: Marina, Lot 2052, Lorong Marina 3/2, Phase 1, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Wei Nee
reviews.text: Klinik yang cantik dan selesa,layanan yang bagus ,staff dan doktor So friendly❤️ Thank you MySmile dental

reviews.name: Sazlina Maidin
reviews.text: The place is clean. Dr Jason is very helpful and great with my daughter. I was present during the whole procedure and my daughter was at ease throughout. Will recommend it to my friends.

reviews.name: Irene Surya
reviews.text:
Hello.

My mother is very scared of needles.  She suffered a month of toothache before finally coming over to MySmile after a lot of convincing and some form of 'bribe '.

She came out of the dental clinic with a big smile and a thumbs up after her procedure.

Thank you, Dr Jason Wong for your patience in explaining from A to Z about the nitrous oxide, the cleaning and scaling needed to be performed.

I also must mention and complement Mdm Suzie, who assisted Dr Jason Wong that morning. She held my mother's hand, and spoke kindly throughout the procedure.

The clinic texted us the next day to ask about my mother's recovery.

This is first class treatment.

I strongly recommend this clinic to everyone who needs the 'gentle touch' of dental treatment.

Thank you, MySmile Dental.

The picture is of my mother watching TV at the clinic after two teeth extraction.

reviews.name: Ding Laing Jok
reviews.text: Very professional and friendly service. My daughter felt comfortable and well cared for throughout the treatment.

reviews.name: Ed Hilton
reviews.text: Friendly staff and informative Doc

address: Lot 920, Ground Floor, Miri City Medical Centre, Jalan Hokkien, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Sze
reviews.text: transparent, clean, friendly. wonderful service from reception to patient seat. dentist lets you know the exact procedure and pricing of what he's going to do before he does it, down to when he expects it might be sensitizing or painful for you. could not recommend enough.

reviews.name: Roselind EastMarine
reviews.text: I just visited this clinic for a tooth scaling procedure and was really pleased with the experience. The doctor was incredibly helpful and took the time to explain each step, which made me feel comfortable and well-informed. My dad also had a tooth extraction, and the care he received was just as excellent. The doctor was very friendly, and the nurses and staff were welcoming and kind, creating a warm and supportive atmosphere. This clinic will definitely be my first choice for future dental check-ups. I highly recommend it to my family and friends!

reviews.name: Doris Lawrence
reviews.text: Saya baru cabut gigi bongsu kat sini, lansung tak sakit ye masa cabut, masa cucuk bius pun tak sakit, dia cuma sakit selepas kesan bius habis tpi tu biasa la, tapi sekejap je, sangat berpuas hati

reviews.name: Noramanina Abu Bakar
reviews.text: Definitely will go there again. I am so amazed with the staffs and the doctor. Well explained. Throughout the procedure, felt more relaxed and didn’t feel discomfort/uneasy. 💪🏼👍🏼

reviews.name: Andalina Dayang
reviews.text: I have been contemplating on which dental clinic I should visit for my dental care with reasonable price, luckily my friend recommending MCMC. The staff/nurse attending are friendly and explaining the flow of the registration well. I wanted to do teeth extraction but the Doctor advised to do filling instead as it still can be save. Luckily, I listened to his advices. He explained the procedure and told me the post-filling discomforty in advance. Afterwards, the staff also told me what-to-do and not via WhatsApp. The staff also check-in on me the very next day and told me to inform them if any unusual symptoms occuring (which in my case, no pain or unusual symptoms). Overall, I have a great experience with them and kudos to everyone for doing a great job!

reviews.name: Suniezan Sharin
reviews.text: Clinic very clean and comfortable, 👍👍👍👍

street: Lot 920, Ground Floor, Miri City Medical Centre, Jalan Hokkien
description:
Within the vibrant heart of Miri, a gem of dental expertise shines through MCMC Dental Clinic, located at the bustling Miri City Medical Centre on Jalan Hokkien. Renowned for its unwavering commitment to oral health, this clinic stands out with its state-of-the-art facilities, offering an array of specialized dental services. From routine check-ups to advanced procedures, the clinic's blend of cutting-edge technology and compassionate care ensures every patient leaves with a healthier smile. The recent feedback from patients lauding the transparent and friendly environment is a testament to the clinic's dedication to excellence.

The quality of care at MCMC Dental Clinic is palpable from the moment one steps in. The welcoming reception area leads to immaculately clean treatment rooms, where comfort meets clinical precision. Patients regularly commend the gentle touch of the dentists, who not only excel in their craft but also in explaining procedures with clarity and patience. The narrative of one patient who experienced a tooth scaling procedure resonates deeply—a story of thoroughness paired with pleasant service, emblematic of the clinic’s patient-centric ethos. It's this consistent delivery of exceptional dental care that fosters enduring trust within the community.

MCMC Dental Clinic is not just a healthcare provider but also a neighbor woven into the fabric of Sarawak’s daily life. Its convenient hours throughout the week reflect a deep understanding of patients' busy schedules, ensuring accessibility for all seeking dental care. The clinic's geographical ease—merely a stone's throw from local landmarks—makes it an easily identifiable fixture for residents and visitors alike. By seamlessly integrating superior dental services within the warm embrace of Miri City’s rhythm, MCMC Dental Clinic remains a paragon of dental excellence and community synergy.

title: Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic
address: 1st Floor, Lot 1907, Marina Square Phase 2, 98000 Miri, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Susan Kong
reviews.text: Long time patient here..dr wilson is very gentle with me which make me feel cared and less scary to do any procedure

reviews.name: Judy Tang
reviews.text: Dr Wilson is the best !

reviews.name: Paul Paulina
reviews.text: Dr Lorna 5 ⭐ the best 👍🏻

reviews.name: Kincaid
reviews.text: Very satisfied with the professionalism and kindness of Dr Jennifer and staff. Had wisdom tooth surgery at Smiley Tooth Dental recently, love the detailed explanation and smooth procedure. Will definitely recommend to my family and friends. 💕

reviews.name: Akmalia Thurs
reviews.text: I have a pleasant painless scaling with Dr Jennifer.

reviews.name: Robert Lee
reviews.text: Comfortable place... Friendly receptionist... Nice doctor...

reviews.name: Raden Hidayat (Dayad Vlog)
reviews.text:
I recently visited Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic for a dental appointment to address a tooth filling, and I must say that my experience was highly positive. The professionalism and friendliness exhibited by the clinic's staff left a lasting impression.

Upon arriving, I was warmly greeted by the receptionist, and despite being 15 minutes late, the staff handled the situation with grace and courtesy. They were accommodating and maintained a friendly demeanor, creating a welcoming atmosphere from the start. They also ensured that I felt comfortable and prioritized my dental needs.

Dr. Jennifer conducted a thorough examination and explained the condition of my teeth in a clear and comprehensible manner. Her expertise and professionalism were evident throughout the process, making me feel confident in the care I was receiving.

The overall environment of Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic is conducive to a positive dental experience. The combination of professionalism, friendliness, and effective communication by Dr. Jennifer and the staff makes this clinic highly recommended.

street: Lot 1907, 1st Floor, Marina Square Phase 2
description:
In the heart of Sarawak's bustling Marina Square, Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic emerges as a cornerstone of dental health, providing an oasis of oral care to a diverse community. Its strategic location makes it easily accessible for residents seeking top-tier dental services, contributing to Malaysia's robust healthcare offerings. With an unwavering commitment to professional excellence, the clinic is a beacon for those in pursuit of impeccable dental hygiene and advanced treatments, wrapped in a warm, comforting environment.

At Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic, the patient experience is crafted with precision and empathy, much like the dental services they offer. Dr. Wilson, a name that resonates with trust and expertise among the clientele, has become synonymous with gentle and meticulous care. Testimonials frequently laud his ability to transform dental appointments from daunting to reassuring experiences. It's not just about the state-of-the-art equipment or the sterile, high-tech environment; it's the human touch, the smiles exchanged before procedures and the assurance of being in capable hands that define this clinic's distinct approach to dental wellness.

Open six days a week with accommodating hours that cater to even the busiest schedules, Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic is intimately woven into the fabric of the community it serves. Whether it's your child's first check-up or your own routine cleaning, this clinic stands out with its unique blend of professional rigor and personal care—a combination that leaves patients not just smiling but radiating confidence. As a local landmark in Marina Square, Smiley Tooth Dental Clinic continues to cultivate smiles that speak volumes of its dedication to the community's oral health.

title: Createeth Dental Clinic Miri (Permaisuri Branch)

reviews.name: Fung Shien Wong
reviews.text: Very professional and friendly dentists and staffs here! Consulted Dr Yap for my kid jaw muscle training and she is very helpful to give good guidance . Thank you Dr Yap!

reviews.name: William Hii
reviews.text: Went to their Bintang Branch for tooth extraction today. Tq Dr Louis for the painless procedure and their gentle staffs. Gratitude from this dentophobic patient. A pleasant visit.

reviews.name: ah shu
reviews.text: Dr. Yap is professional, communicates clearly, and is reasonably priced. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Senorieyta Rieyna
reviews.text: I recently visited Dr. Yap for scaling and filling treatments, and I’m very happy with the experience. Dr. Yap was professional, gentle, and explained everything clearly, which made me feel comfortable throughout the procedure. The treatment was smooth and effective, and the best part—it was all done at a very reasonable and affordable price. I truly appreciate the care and quality of service provided. Highly recommended if you’re looking for excellent dental care at a cost that won’t stretch your budget.

reviews.name: Shira Galang Charleshira
reviews.text: Friendly receiptionist , staff & Dentist. Cozy and clean waiting area. All procedure well explained by Dentist

reviews.text: Good service from Doctor Dasween.
